creator: lucian.grijincu@avira.com
text:
The doxygen comment for APR_FOPEN_LARGEFILE wants to warn about some issue.
Seems like the definition got moved around and got separated from the warning /
or somebody forgot to post what the warning was :)

"#define APR_FOPEN_LARGEFILE   0x04000
Platform dependent flag to enable large file support; WARNING see below."

Thanks, the warning used the old APR_LARGEFILE macro name, fixed on the trunk:

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=532737
creator: jorton@redhat.com
